    <head>
      <link type="text/css" rel="stylesheet" href="/site.css" />
      <title>Hello</title>
    </head>
    <body>
      <h1>Hello Forbes!</h1>
    </body>
=======
<!doctype html>
<html>
    <head>
      <link type="text/css" rel="stylesheet" href="/site.css" />
      <title>Hello</title>
    </head>
    <body>
      <h1>Hello Forbes!</h1>
    </body>
